services.description: Develop cross-platform solutions that run smoothly on both Android and iOS. For native Android development, I leverage Kotlin to utilize its modern features and interoperability with existing Java code.I have developed 5 Android apps as part of real-world projects, and 3 of them are published on the store. The remaining 2 are still under development.

Develop cross-platform applications that maintain a native look and feel. The focus is on creating apps that offer seamless performance and an exceptional user experience. I pay close attention to design aesthetics and functionality, ensuring that the final product aligns perfectly with your vision and meets the high standards of the iOS platform

Utilize Flutter to create consistent and visually appealing cross-platform user interfaces. HTML/CSS is employed for crafting the front-end with attention to detail and responsiveness. For the backend, I use Java Spring/Servlet to develop powerful and scalable server-side applications.
Use Figma for designing wireframes and prototypes, allowing for iterative feedback and refinement. Adobe tools are used to enhance the visual elements and ensure high-quality graphics.
